author: Stefan Castle (Bouncy Castle Network)
content: I got to This & That every working day for a rice and three veg curry and a chapatti for Â£4.20 - it is amazing. I have been going for over 20 years and have never got bored! The decor is simple and functional but the food is amazing. Proper healthy curry like your mum would make! And the staff are friendly too. I can't recommend This & That enough :)
